TestCase.name: tpch q1
TestCase.Resource: select l_returnflag, l_linestatus, sum(l_quantity) as sum_qty, sum(l_extendedprice) as sum_base_price, sum(l_extendedprice * (1 - l_discount)) as sum_disc_price, sum(l_extendedprice * (1 - l_discount) * (1 + l_tax)) as sum_charge, avg(l_quantity) as avg_qty, avg(l_extendedprice) as avg_price, avg(l_discount) as avg_disc, count(*) as count_order from lineitem where l_shipdate <= date '1998-12-01' - interval '71' day group by l_returnflag, l_linestatus order by l_returnflag, l_linestatus;

RwBatchExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=SINGLETON, keys=[]}], collation=[[0, 1]]) RwBatchSort(sort0=[$0], sort1=[$1], dir0=[ASC], dir1=[ASC]) RwBatchProject(l_returnflag=[$0], l_linestatus=[$1], sum_qty=[$2], sum_base_price=[$3], sum_disc_price=[$4], sum_charge=[$5], avg_qty=[/($6, $7)], avg_price=[/($8, $9)], avg_disc=[/($10, $11)], count_order=[$12]) RwBatchHashAgg(group=[{0, 1}], sum_qty=[SUM($2)], sum_base_price=[SUM($3)], sum_disc_price=[SUM($4)], sum_charge=[SUM($5)], agg#4=[SUM($6)], agg#5=[SUM($7)], agg#6=[SUM($8)], agg#7=[SUM($9)], agg#8=[SUM($10)], agg#9=[SUM($11)], agg#10=[$SUM0($12)]) RwBatchExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0, 1]}], collation=[[]]) RwBatchHashAgg(group=[{0, 1}], sum_qty=[SUM($2)], sum_base_price=[SUM($3)], sum_disc_price=[SUM($4)], sum_charge=[SUM($5)], agg#4=[SUM($2)], agg#5=[COUNT($2)], agg#6=[SUM($3)], agg#7=[COUNT($3)], agg#8=[SUM($6)], agg#9=[COUNT($6)], count_order=[COUNT()]) RwBatchProject(l_returnflag=[$4], l_linestatus=[$5], l_quantity=[$0], l_extendedprice=[$1], $f4=[*($1, -(1, $2))], $f5=[*(*($1, -(1, $2)), +(1, $3))], l_discount=[$2]) RwBatchFilter(condition=[<=(CAST($6):TIMESTAMP(0), -(1998-12-01, 6134400000:INTERVAL DAY))]) RwBatchTableScan(table=[[test_schema, lineitem]], columns=[l_quantity,l_extendedprice,l_discount,l_tax,l_returnflag,l_linestatus,l_shipdate])
